name: What Do We Eat for Dinner?
name_original: What Do We Eat for Dinner?
description:
I don't know, what do we want to eat? A logic game of meta proportions, help you and your roommates decide what food you guys want to eat. But, just like in real life, it might take a while for everyone to agree...

What Do We Eat for Dinner? was created for Global Game Jam 2015 by a two-person team: Phyllis Douglas and Andrew Elliott. We used the LOVE 2D engine.

The music used can be found here: http://www.bensound.com

How to Play

Control is done through the keyboard.

  • Enter/Return/Spacebar key: Confirm selection or start game.
  • Backspace key: Return to previous menu.
  • Up/Down/Left/Right keys: Navigate menu.
  • Q/ESC keys: Quit game.

Questions, Comments or Concerns?

If you are having problems or want to know more about the game, please tweet Phyllis (@goofanader) or email her at phyllis_1510@msn.com about the problems/etc.

Thanks for playing our game!
